mapper.select: SELECT t.*, ar.name AS artist_name, al.cover_image FROM track t LEFT JOIN artist ar ON t.artist_id = ar.id LEFT JOIN album al ON t.album_id = al.id ORDER BY t.id DESC LIMIT 12
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO track (id, title, duration, genre, streaming_url, mv_url, album_id, artist_id, popularity, track_no) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{duration}, #{genre}, #{streamingUrl}, #{mvUrl}, #{albumId}, #{artistId}, #{popularity}, #{trackNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE track SET title = #{title}, duration = #{duration}, genre = #{genre}, streaming_url = #{streamingUrl}, mv_url = #{mvUrl}, album_id = #{albumId}, artist_id = #{artistId}, popularity = #{popularity}, track_no = #{trackNo} WHERE id = #{id}
